aboutMe.title: About

selfIntroduction.p1: I am an independent developer familiar with Vue, React, and Nuxt. I can also develop backend services using Golang and NestJS. I understand Linux operations and virtualization and can independently deploy full-stack projects.
selfIntroduction.p2: With experience in graphic design (Ps, Ai) and video editing (FCPX), I focus on interface aesthetics and user experience. I enjoy bringing creativity to life through code and visuals.
selfIntroduction.p3: I am passionate about building products with a human touch while emphasizing engineering quality and user experience. Here, I will share my projects, experiences, and inspirations, hoping to explore the boundaries of technology and creation with you.

aboutMe.subscribeDescription: Welcome to follow my social media and GitHub. If you need to collaborate, please contact me through the channels below.

profile.userId: Your unique user ID on this site, which cannot be modified.
profile.usernameHint: This is the username you use when posting comments. If you haven't set one, your email address will be displayed.
profile.resetPwdHint: You can tap here to reset your password
profile.createdAt: The time when you created your account.

login.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
login.passwordShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
login.autoRegisterTip: If you don't have an account, you will be automatically registered. Please make sure your password is entered correctly.
login.confirmRegisterTip: Click to confirm the registration of your new account. Please remember your password carefully. If unsure, you can re-fill out the form.
login.formInvalid: Form content does not meet requirements
login.passwordError: Incorrect password. Please try again later.
login.userExists: User already exists. Duplicate registration is not allowed.

docEdit.metaEditTip: Edit the form below to write the document. It is recommended to set the title as the primary heading of your document. Click the button on the right to edit the article's meta information.
docEdit.editMetaTip: Set basic information such as the article's title and subtitle.
docEdit.cancelTip: Once you cancel, all unsaved edits will be lost.
docEdit.title: Article Title
docEdit.subtitle: Article Subtitle
docEdit.dataIncomplete: Submitted data is incomplete or no changes were made
docEdit.docNotFound: Article with the corresponding UUID not found. Please check the correctness.

docList.title: Article List
docList.manageTip: You can manage all articles here, including writing, modifying, and deleting, with support for MD syntax.
docList.deleteTip: Please re-confirm the article information to be deleted below. Deletion is a soft delete; if you need to restore an article, you must manually operate the database.
docList.searchSubtitle: Enter the title of the article you want to search for (supports fuzzy queries).
docList.searchLabel: Title (click or press Enter to search)
docList.fetchError: Failed to retrieve the article list. Please try again later.
docList.missingUuid: Missing article unique UUID. Please try again.
docList.paginationTip: Using pagination requires navigating to the article list page. The home page only previews the latest 10 results, but you can click on article cards to read them.

password.newMinLength: New password must be at least {length} characters long
password.newSameAsOld: New password cannot be the same as the old password
password.resetSuccess: Password reset completed. Please use the new password for your next login.
password.resetError: Password reset failed. Please check your input or try again later.
